#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<map>
#include<set>

#include<cstring>

#define INF 2000000000
#define INF_LL 2000000000000000000ll
#define MOD_7 1000000007
#define MOD_9 1000000009

typedef long long ll;

using namespace std;


int a[100];

int check(int x,int n,int m,int sum)
{
    int b[100]={0};
    int i;
    
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
     b[i]=i+x;
    
    
    int ret = 0;
    for(i=0;i<m;i++)
    {
        if(a[i]>b[i])
         ret+=a[i]-b[i];
    }
    
    return ret;
}

int main()
{
    int t,x,i,n,j;
    
    
    scanf("%d",&t);
    
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d",&n);
        
        int sum=0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%d",&a[i]);
            sum+=a[i];
        }
        
        bool f = false;
        int ans=1000000;
        for(i=0;i<=sum;i++)
        {
            if(((i+i+n-1)*n)/2 != sum)
             continue;
            
            f=true;
            ans=min(ans,check(i,n,n,sum));
        }
        
        if(f)
         printf("%d\n",ans);
        else
         printf("-1\n");
        
    }
    
    
    return 0;
}
